segments.text: I think this kitchen's about to have a big problem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflow from the sink is spreading fast across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult doesn't even glance down; she's lost in her chore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It scares me thinking about someone slipping on that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's climb on the stool adds to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That thing's not steady at allâ€”it's tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching right into the cookie jar with such glee.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But if he drops those cookies, or worse, falls himself...
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so excited, arm up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules, but in a harmless way, I suppose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's already soaking the cabinet doors below the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a real hazard for the whole family.
segments.speaker: PAR
